analysis.description:
SimplePHXSalesContract.withdrawEth (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#124-128) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#127-128)

Reentrancy in SimplePHXSalesContract.buy (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#94-103):
	External calls:
	- phxCoin.transfer(msg.sender,tokensOffered[_offeror]) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#98-102)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _offeror.transfer(_purchasePrice) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#102-103)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- offerors (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#103)
	- pricePerToken (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#103)
	- tokensOffered (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#103)
SimplePHXSalesContract._humanSender (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#131-135) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in SimplePHXSalesContract.canceloffer (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#87-93):
	External calls:
	- phxCoin.transfer(msg.sender,tokensOffered[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#89-92)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- AddrNdx (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#93)
	- tokensOffered (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#93)

Reentrancy in SimplePHXSalesContract.offer (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#55-67):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(phxCoin.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_tokensOffered)) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#58-60)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- AddrNdx (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#66)

SimplePHXSalesContract.canceloffer (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#87-93) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-phxCoin.transfer(msg.sender,tokensOffered[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#89-92)

SimplePHXSalesContract.buy (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#94-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-phxCoin.transfer(msg.sender,tokensOffered[_offeror]) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2f74420b967c1c2c1c162aa27ddf8efce532328b.sol#98-102)
